entry.title: Why Your Comments not Getting Approved
entry.content:
Comments are the basic, easiest and most popular way to create backlink from a good reputed blog to your blog, maybe you already know this, may be you don’t. If you know it, that’s good but if you don’t then you must need to know it, because in this awesome business called `Blogging` links and backlinks have a great importance. Many people are facing a problem in commenting, this might be possible that you also having that problem, problem of not getting your comments approved. Don’t worry today your this problem will be solved, all you need to do is, just read this post very carefully.

Reasons for Comments not Accepting

 

Formality

`Oh Wow…. What a nice post, great work.`

`This is a good post, thanks for sharing.`

`Full of information, nice thank you.`

These kind of comments are totally formality, if you post comments like that on others blog and hope that those will be approved, you are simply a newbie. Bloggers want real appreciation or suggestions to their work, they don’t need these kind of formality, see if they have written a post, they already know that it’s a great post, you don’t need to tell them it’s great.  

No Gravtar Image

If you commented on a blog and your comment not got approved by webmaster, this point is may be responsible for it, if you have not setted up a Gravtar image for your profile, Bloggers always want their blog to look good and believe me a comment without Gravtar image looks ugly in comment section and most of the people hate it and they don’t accept comments, no matter how good they are. See : How to Show your photo with your comment.  

Fake Accounts

Never ever use any fake account for commenting purpose, see if a blogger is capable to make you comment on his blog, it simply means he/she is a person with decent knowledge and they can easily find out if your details are fake and in that case there is no chance of approving of your comment, Be original comment with your name, your profile.  

Comment not related to the Article

If you are reading a post pertaining to blogging or SEO and if at the end of the post you are commenting about Justin Bieber, you are simply showing you have lack of knowledge and you are just trying to show your presence there, which doesn’t have any meaning, so don’t do that ever.  

Comment for Link

Everybody know if someone is commenting on a blog most probably he is doing that for one basic purpose, that is backlink but if you are showing this clearly through your comment that you only want a backlink from that blog, you don’t care about their content of post they will not approve your comment in any case. You need to understand their write ups and then generate question from it, then if you will ask a question from the blogger regarding the post, they will surely approve your comment and will reply back.  

Link in Comment

I’m really unable to understand how people are doing this foolishness even in these days. They open a post on a popular blog and writes. `This is really a good information check this out http:………………………………….’ if you have done this it’s ok, everyone was a stupid once, but if you are going to do this again ever, you are going to waste your time, nobody like this type of comment strategy and only inexperienced bloggers approves these type of comments. You can add link to your comment but only and only when it is must needed, generally never do this, this shows you are new, immature and unknown to blogging.  

Wrong Language and Words

Don’t use cheap language or any bad stuff related to any religion, racism, or any country. vulgarity is strictly prohibited in the business of blogging, if you are not happy with something that’s your problem don’t show your Pent up feelings to anyone, nobody cares, nobody likes it and this is true. Your comment will be trashed immediately.  

Fallacious English

This is also a big reason for not getting a comment approved, as big bloggers want their post and blog to look good they also like to see good things in comments below their post. Wrong language and broken English is like a blot to their awesome work and everybody hates it, like you do, so always try to be simple, original and straight forward. Must read : Best and All Adsense Tips and Tutorials. If you have read this post in the same way I said above, `carefully` then I promise your every comment will be approved at every blog, you just take care of these points and comment originally, related to the topic, in proper language strictly avoid formality and vulgarity. Before commenting must read the post and nothing will be more awesome than this, if your comment will have a doubt or query related to the topic written in post.

entry.title: How to Optimize your Database from cPanel
entry.content:
To help your website or blog in performance, keeping your database(s) optimized is always a great step. No matter you are using InMotion Hosting, GoDaddy Hosting, Hostgator hosting or any other hosting cPanel account or hosting Account, this can be easily done using phpMyAdmin. Make it sure before optimizing your database all your data backup. You can ”Optimize Table” to reclaim unused space and defregment the data file for optimal performance.  If a lot of changes have been made to a table, optimizing the table can sometimes significantly improve performance.

Steps to Optimize Database tables from cPanel..

  • Log in to your website cPanel.
[caption id=”attachment_9432” align=”aligncenter” width=”394”] Log in to cPanel[/caption]  
  • Click on phpMyAdmin under Databases section.
[caption id=”attachment_9433” align=”aligncenter” width=”580”] Click on phpMyAdmin under Databases section[/caption]
  • Now look at left, you will see your `Database` name on which you’re working on there, just click on it.
[caption id=”attachment_9434” align=”aligncenter” width=”580”] click on Database` name on which you’re working[/caption]
  • Now go down and click on `Check All` it will select all your database tables.
[caption id=”attachment_9435” align=”aligncenter” width=”580”] click on check all to select all tables[/caption]  
  • Click on drop down Menu next to `Check All/Uncheck All` and select `Optimize table`.
[caption id=”attachment_9436” align=”aligncenter” width=”511”] click on Optimize Table[/caption]

This is it, you have done, database of your website has been optimized, if you have any sub-domains or any Add on domains in your account then just do same things (step 3 to 5) to optimize their databases. Database optimization is recommended to do on a regular basis as a preventive measure, it doesn’t take much effort but it do affect a site’s or blog’s performance a lot.

entry.title: How to Get PR for my Blog ?
entry.content:
I’m sure you have heard of PR or Page Rank or Google Page Rank, these all are the same thing. As I said I’m sure you may have heard of Google Page rank, but.. there are only very few people who knows what exactly Google Page rank stands for. If you get high pr backlinks for your blog it take your blog to the great height. You don’t need to go for any buy back links from any paid link building service you can get PR in free just by following tips given here. Having a blog or website in present Internet world is not enough, there are thousands of people over internet doing same thing you’re doing, so you must need to make your blog content visible enough to get maximum hits. Google PageRank is one of the most important factors that Google uses to determine the importance of any blog and it is strongly based on the value of your Blog’s inbound links. Google generally evaluates how many links there are to your blog from other pages, and the relevance and quality of the linking sites.

How to Get Google Pagerank

Getting pagerank or improve page rank is not everyone’s cup of tea. One need to utilize all techniques available in order to make their web presence attractive, unique and appealing so that it help them in `improve search engine ranking`. This is just a meta description, read further if you are now thinking `how to increase page rank of my website` reading and taking them in practice will surely help you to boost your webpage ranking further. Also read : How to Increase Traffic, Ranking and Presence.

High Quality Content

Well, in blogging field it is most important to know that `Content is King` if you want Page Rank for your blog or you want increase Page Rank, then you must have high quality original content on your blog. If your blog will have original and valuable content then readers will love to spend their time reading your articles and sharing goes higher this way.  

Guest posting

Guest posting is the most popular, trusted and effective way to get PR for a blog see when you writes a guest post for a blog having remarkable Page Rank, then you gets a high-quality, relevant inbound link to your website and Google gives it preference more than anything else to consider a blog for giving Pagerank.You must ensure that the blog where you’re going to publish your article is a reputed blog and it’s having good Page Rank.  

Directory Submission

Directory submission is a bit time consuming process, but it is also true that in order to boost Page Rank you must have high quality Backlinks associated with your blog name and believe me submit your site on different web directories and article directories  is the best way to generate quality backlinks for any blog. Some popular Directories to submit your blog link are Yahoo Directory, DMOZ, Best Of The Web, Ezine Articles, Article Base.  

Comment on Blogs

I think this is the easiest and most crucial step in getting and improving Google Page Rank. Blogging requires a Blogger very active socially. When you land on any blog for any kind of information make it your habit to leave a genuine comment there, because some Blogs are Do-Follow and they can help you to easily generate back links for your blog.  

Social Bookmarking

I don’t think I need to explain importance of Social Bookmarking, as it is a most common effective way to get free traffic as well as increase Page Rank, look when we share our Site on different Social networks we gets decent traffic and also free Backlink. Most popular Social Bookmarking Sites are Facebook, g+, Twitter, Stumble Upon , digg.  

Website Accessibility

This is the fact which most of the people don’t care about, but this plays very significant role in reputation of your blog in front of Google. It can be easily understood that, if a Website remains  down for a long period of time, Google slowly reduce the ranking of that particular site. So You must ensure that your Website is always up.  

Regularly Updation

Imagine you’re a teacher and there are many student in your class, some comes for lecture occasionally where as some comes daily, then whom will you prefer as your best students, you know your answer very well, same like that Google really like blogs that keep their content fresh and unique. The more you post, Google crawls your site more and it simply increases chances for you to improve page rank. Fun Blogging : Google is a Girl, I can Prove it.  

Link Exchange

This technique is one of that rare technique which is in use from the starting of blogging and surprisingly it still works, many tops bloggers doing this and in order to get a good Page Rank for your blog, you should link your blog to high page rank blogs, by following this you will surely get  Page Rank for your blog and also your blog will get traffic from that site.  

No-follow Links

There are millions of blogger over internet world these days, and they keep on posting on their blogs and websites for some specific purposes but I bet most of them don’t know about dofollow and nofollow links properly and because of lack of knowledge about this, they are spreading free dofollow links to other sites unnecessarily. Must read : How to make a link nofollow or dofollow.  

Keywords and Tags

You may know that already, keywords and meta tags are one of the key factor for getting traffic to a site and it is one of the most crucial factors in the search engine ranking system. This step is quite taskful as searching of valuable keywords in never easy and once you get best keywords by following it’s searching and competition volume, use them strategically. This will boost your Traffic, ranking, earnings and yes Page Rank.  

Inter Linking

Inter linking your posts is a way to provide access to a related posts from one post and it’s a very useful tool to get better ranking, it increases your websites accessibility so when you think you can link your any previous post to your new one must integrate them because this is a basic as well as effective technique for effective link building.  

Engage Visitor

Nothing is more effective than this point, if you successfully keep your the visitors engaged in reading your Articles via interesting and likeable stuff. You can make your visitor stick to your blog by interactive site design, interesting feedback section and Videos which make the visitor watch them. Also read : Idiotic but superb ways to promote your blog. Google have not updated PR after it’s last updation in Feb, 2013 so it is expected that, next PR distribution date is very close now, so without wasting time start try to link your blog with high pr sites and if you can successfully get high pr back links then chances of getting PR increases much more. You can also go for Website Advertising, participation on forums for making your blog presence everywhere you can, but don’t ever use any illegal or wrong way to getting backlink to your blog because in starting they may give you some links and traffic but eventually it sounds so bitter and you may fall in trouble, so Be Genuine, Be original, Work your Ass off and leave rest on G(od+oogle) Happy Blogging, I really hope Google will give you and Me Page Rank in this update.. ;)

entry.title: Tips & Requirements for Get Approved Adsense Account
entry.content:
Many people owning many blogs and websites and most of them doing that thing for getting income, Google Adsense is the most famous name for earning through the Internet. Google Adsense provide Ads to the Blogs and sites and when a visitor visit to the blog He/She see Ads over there If they like to know more about the thing shown in the Ad and open  it by clicking  on it, then Google provide some Income to the Adsence Account from where the Ads were placed on the Blog or website.  The hardest part of getting started with Adsense is getting Google to approve your website. In fact  for many people even  it is easier to get a loan of $100,000 from bank than getting a approved Google Adsense account :) . The solution of such problem is to make your blog prepared before you apply for Adsense. You can’t start using Google Adsense on your Blog until you are approved by Google. The very first thing you must do is read Carefully Adsense Program Policies & Terms of Service (TOS) and also very important Terms and Conditions. If your site doesn’t fall within the guidelines that Google sets out, it will be denied.  Some very important points are listed below which every webmaster or Blogger need to keep in their mind and follow them carefully before applying for Google Adsense Account..  

Points need to focus for approved by Google Adsense :

  • Your Blog should not be Under Construction it shoud be running.
  •  Website Fulfill almost every points mentioned on Program Policies & Terms of Service (TOS).
  • Website or Blog Getting  decent Traffic.
  • There is no too many pages on your Blog.
  • There is no Copyrighted data on your blog from any other blog use original content, write for your blog by yourself.
 Now you may understand Creating a website is not a big deal at all, the real challenge is to get traffic and that too from search engines so if your blog has very less traffic than wait few months and than apply for Adsense. Your website should be according to the Terms and Conditions of Google make it sure there is  no adult content, warez, gambling sites, Hacking and hate spreading contents & Copyrighted Data or post on your website. Be Regular on updating Post try to upload a new post in 3-4 days on your blog  if it’s not possible for you than fix a time interval for uploading posts and follow them sincerely, regularly updating Blogs attracts Google and If they find useful contents on your blog your account will be approved without any problem.  

 Quality and Original  Content

Quality Content is the Best than anything on a blog,  as a famous writer said “It’s Good to publish a single quality Article once in a week than Publishing Scrap Daily”. This is very simple to understand If Post or Content on your Blog is Original (not copyrighted) and written in the best manner then your Application will be accepted very easily by the Adsense Team. You can take ideas from any blog or website but you can’t Copy and paste them on your blog otherwise You will never Get  an Approved Adsense Account.  

Simple and Easy Design

 Before submitting your site for Adsense make sure that the design you use in the site is a simple one with no much graphics works also it is nice if you have a easy navigation process in your site and try to avoid other ad networks while the reviewing process is going on, its not a compulsory one but a simple factor which may  help you to get the Adsense. Also remember to avoid any kinds of adult, hate spreading and Hacking contents since Adsense won’t approve any sites that is having such contents.  

 Apply Once, wait for Reply

Now If you think that your Blog is ready for submitting to Adsense after reading the points given above then you go to Adsense  Sign up Page and then submit complete information about your Blog & yourself and make it sure you  fill only real personal information.   After sending application to Adsense you will get a reply e-mail from Adsense Team regarding they partially checked your website after that  follow the procedure given in the mail.  If You can’t received any mail from them then Don’t worry you will be surely respond, sometimes it takes time because they have millions of application from the bloggers all over the world. Generally they reply in maximum 4 days, sometime they reply in 2 days or even 1 day. If your application got Disapproved by the Adsense Team, don’t start Crying :D Don’t worry they mention point why your request got  disapproved just fulfill the requirement (mentioned in point)  and apply again because they have lot of applications and they give preference to only Best. Some people when get disapproval mail they send another request instantly  from different email account without taking care of the point in the mail, you don’t do this foolish thing because your blog was not checked by any person their machine or Software check blogs and Website and don’t matter how many email accounts you use for submitting application they only approve your blog if their machine and Software declare it okay.   By fulfilling all these points and following steps you will get an approved Google Adsense Account easily in maximum 4-5 days. This post give the complete information of many Adsense related questions like, What are requirements for a blog approved by Google Adsense, Tips to get approval for Google Adsense & Best way to get approved by Google Adsense..

Note :

Use your real name instead of using any nick or fake name in application if You need to be 18 years old or above, and always remember Even after your blog got approved and you start running Google ads on your blog or website you can’t post anything on it, if you break the TOS, your Adsense account will be removed or possibly banned. Read and obey very carefully Adsense Terms and Conditions, it may take your time but it is very necessary for good business with Google. as we said in the earlier post  What is Blogging, Why Blogging becoming Popular in Youth ? never think money is the fruits for your hard deeds but to earn these fruits, you need to show dedicated efforts. Always remember good things takes time. I Hope this post gives you the way to get an approved Adsense account, if you have any Query and Suggestions to share please comment below,  It will my honor to communicate with you..

entry.title: Most Common reasons for Disapproval of Google Adsense Application
entry.content:
In blogging many people says that I applied for Ads to the Google, but my application got rejected or whenever I apply for Adsense Ads, Google disapproves my request. Even my requests got disapproved two times before I got approved, but people don’t know, what are the reasons responsible for the disapproval of their Adsense application, Google always mentions some reasons in reply email which are responsible for not accepting one’s Ads application. If you read those email(s) properly then you will understand some of the points why Google rejected it.

Here are the some most common reasons for disapproval of your Adsense Application..

1. Too Many Tags or Keywords

You  might know that Tags plays a very important role in improving your page’s visibility in the search engines. Search engines always search for the tags which show what is in your post. Actually these tags are the keywords or the word phrases that people types on different search engines for searching answer of their query. If you don’t know that then must settle this thing in your mind that, you should not give too many keywords in your post, because sometimes written articles are not so informative, but if it contains too many keywords search engines crawls, just because there are many keywords, but Google will not take the post as a healthy webpage, which makes a negative impression of your site to the search engine and Google never approve ads request from those blogs/sites. Tags must be used in the post according to it’s quantity and quality. Using unusual, useless and irrelevant tags with an article reduces your credibility with the search engines and even people who come to see your website will not feel good, just imagine the moment you are searching for something and you open pages shown from search engine but you won’t find anything about the thing you are searching for, I’m sure you will never comeback to that particular site then why someone comes to your. See using irrelevant, useless and inappropriate tags in your post may increase your visitors but Google will not accept your Adsense request, because as a good service provider Google always wants to provide best output to the every person using it.

 2. Lack of Quality Content

You must read this very very carefully, whenever you start writing for you website or any website you must write informative and original content instead of copying someone’s idea before you apply for Google Adsense. As I said Google is the best search engine and as the best service provider Google always looks for content that visitors would love to read from beginning till the end. If your website contains very few articles you will find it really difficult to get approve Adsense account. Atleast in the beginning, prefer to write content that which attaract the attention of readers so that Google consider your application. In your post use titles  and heading that are catchy as well as popular, and never neglect to post genuine and innovative material.and one most important point in article writing is it is better to have text as well as quality pictures in your post and also include videos too, these things make the post more interactive. People love to stay on those pages instead of the webpages that contain only text in post, but it doesn’t mean you use use picture in each of your post, if pictures are not relevant don’t use them.

 3. Presence of Copied Content

People think they can make Google fool but dear this is really a very tough thing to do, so if you are using any kind of copy paste either you stop this or stop dreaming of Adsense ads on your site because Google really hate copied and it’s not so tough for google to figure out copied content in a post or webpage, You may don’t know that but it’s true that by doing this you are harming your prestige in the cyber world. Google uses many algorithms and systems to track any kind copied content or any material easily, and most important by doing this you will disgrace your image in front of your readers. It’s pretty easy to understand that, copy+paste is very easy for anyone one can copy content of a website and paste it on his own but as we know such kind of content isn’t consider as new and so that the particular blog or site will not get indexed by search engines and will not get ranking too. If Google or other search engines will not index your page then from where you will get visitors, from nowhere ! and as the result visits, views and clicks on your blog will be very low and you will get nothing. In short don’t do copy-paste.

 4. Invalid Clicks and Comments

Many people generally thinks that if they click on their webpages their pageviews, traffic will increase and by doing this they will earn better but guys it’s called invalid clicks which is considered as a fraud or cheating by the internet companies. People who don’t have Adsense yet must remember, invalid clicks activity will make it much more difficult for your blog to get approved and even if you have approved Adsense account it doesn’t meant it will stay with you forever, invalid clicks and impression can also lead to cancellation of your approved adsense account.

 5. Incomplete Websites

This is the most important factor people don’t think about, they won’t give their attention to this but Google does, various necessary pages like About page, Privacy page and Contact page is very essential for Adsense, these pages provides info. about the blogger and Blog (the content what your blog contains) it creates a bond between readers and the blogger. Before submitting your application for Google Adsense you must have complete webpages that can be considered by Google, and yes Incomplete webpages will not be accepted and your application will get rejected until you complete it and resubmit your form. I hope my effort help you, for any query, suggestion must comment, don’t forget to share..

entry.title: Awesome SEO Tricks to Optimize Your Website in SERP
entry.content:
SEO (Search Engine Optimization) is the most critical factor which is responsible for optimizing of any blog or website and make it’s appearance on all the top Search Engine in searched Results which enhance the traffic on your a website. Critical factor which is important here is to get the keywords on which you want the visitors to reach your site through SERP (Search Engine Results Page). Well in case you are new in blogging field then you must need to  be aware of some very basic SEO tips and tricks to improve your website’s ranking in the Search engine results.

Awesome SEO tricks to Optimize Your Website in SERP

Keywords in Title Tag

If you know about this then read this point one time and if you are not familiar with this I will recommend you to read this at least thrice, Title Tag is one of the most important factor to take  your posts on higher level searched results based on Keywords you chosen. This tag gets visible in the clickable link on the SERPs. It is always recommended to to start your title with a long-tail keyword having less competition, you must use Adwords tool for this. Always try to use your Keyword within the range of 65 characters as search engine bots give preference to them, and always try to repetition of Keywords in your posts title otherwise your site could be penalized.

Use Keywords in Header Tags

Header tags are one of the most compelling on-page search engine optimization factors. Try to use the same keywords in all the heading tags by following this simple trick you can easily transfer focus of the page on a single keyword while superiority in search engines. You should better use your main keyword in the first section tag and try to keep the use of keywords in mandatory required way.

Use Keywords in Image Alt tag

I think this point is very much responsible for success of Harkuchh.com and many other blogs on web, Images are best way to express many words, and Search Engine Spiders don’t understand image so it have to translate any images they only read the alt tag with text description to understand the image. Therefore, it is essential to have a substantial description of any image you use in your post on your website. This will surely optimize the images in your content and rank higher in search image.

Use Power of Internal Linking

Never ever make mistake of avoiding internal linking as it’s one of the most significant factor and most of the bloggers specially Newbies often ignore Internal Linking which lead them to failure. The better approach is to reactivate and revitalize the old posts in archive, as compared to link them in your fresh posts. Never ignore the role of internal linking in the distribution of page rank.

Links from Directories

There are so many top Directories over internet which helps the submitted websites and links to get searched on search engines so Planting in directories, like Google’s Webmasters, Yahoo, DMOZ and some other article and content directories can be very helpful to achieve positive ranking and get more searched as well.

Meta Description

Well Google now gives quite less importance to meta tags but still there are two meta tags matter in SEO, Meta description tag are important for both human and search engine perspective. Description meta tag is what you use to illustrate your website. In fact, this description is what visitors see when your site appears in the search results.

Use Keywords Meta Tag

Put your relevant keywords in Keywords tags but take care of avoiding replicas and Keyword stuffing in post, tags or anywhere else. The keywords that you mention in the keyword tag is used to the context of your page are relevant, and the keywords used in meta keywords must be written somewhere in your post or article, if you will not do this by this way your website will be penalized for irrelevant content and it will give you that pain which is not easy to suffer from.

entry.title: How to make a link Nofollow in WordPress
entry.content:
Before proceeding, I think knowing the difference between a no-follow and a do-follow link is very vital, Nofollow and dofollow are two very oftenly used words in SEO. Blogging became very popular in last half decade, but many Bloggers of our generation making a big mistake in blogging, and it is spreading of dofollow links to other website-blogs unnecessarily. See, while writing post on your blog when you give a link of any other blog somewhere in your post it becomes a dofollow link and by this way you are giving a free do follow link to that blog, which is really not needed. A normal Dofollow link allows all search engines to follow them and reach the linked website. It give link juice and a back link. If a webmaster is linking back to you with this link both Search Engine and people will be able to follow. Enable The best way to give someone dofollow love making keyword in the anchor text. This means that when you use a link to a website or page, the targeted keywords as anchor text. A modified Nofollow links does not allow any search engine robot to surf the link, now here point to pay attention is that, if you’ll give a nofollow attribute tag to a links on your web page or website it links you from other page but because of nofollow attribute, it does not pass link juice. Any Reader can only follow the links but search engines don’t. It’s a strong Google’s recommendation that when we link our article with any other website we must have to be very sure that it’s a good website. Sometimes we need to link some p0rn , hacking kind of sites which are generally not consider as a legit or good site, there you will have to add nofollow link attribute. It becomes even more necessary if you are using affiliate marketing, and keep adding affiliate links on your blog. Being truthful, adding a nofollow tag to any link is damn easy, in order to make any link nofollow, all you need to do is `add nofollow attributes in HTML formal` for example <a href=”http://royalyouth.com” rel=”nofollow” > Royalyouth</a> But I’m pretty sure many of us wants to get things done more easier, I know some might not like the idea of using HTML to add Nofollow link attribute.

WordPress plugin to add no-follow Tag attribute

As the most awesome feature of WordPress is that, you can have plugin for doing almost any thing. For WordPress users there are some plugins which will let then make all the outgoing links nofollow, but we don’t have to make all external links nofollow because there are also several benefits of dofollow external link in SEO. Ultimate Nofollow WordPress plugin is best of it’s type, it helps blogger to quickly add nofollow tag to any link while writing post. This is a plug and play plugin so for using this All you have to do is, download and install Ultimate Nofollow plugin to your WordPress account, once you activate th plugin, it will add a nofollow option box in insert link pop-up box in WordPress post editor (see the pic below). [caption id=”attachment_8842” align=”aligncenter” width=”480”] make a link nofollow in WordPress[/caption] For making the comments links nofollow, You can also go to settings > Nofollow, and uncheck the option to make your comment links nofollow. So if you was searching for the best way to make a link nofollow in WordPress or How to make a link Nofollow in WordPress, it’s the best way. Enjoy this plugin it’s for you.

entry.title: How to Manage Blog and Blogging During Exams
entry.content:
Exam time is close now and this is the most popular question for bloggers category that ‘How to deal with blog and study during exams consistently’ and it’s like a task for all bloggers to manage blog and study during exams, as a blogger you can’t stop blogging for long time interval and you also can’t ignore academic exams because these are very important. So the question is `How to manage Blog and Exams Together` if you ask this to people mostly will suggest you to stop or ignore blogging until your exams get over but I recommend you to don’t do that otherwise it will effect your site ranking, traffic and earnings as well. I have great solutions for this problem which I follow during my engineering exams, and trust me, they work always like a charm for me to effectively manage my blog during exams and I’m 100% sure they will also help you a lot, here are the..  

5 Simple Ways To Manage Your Blog During Exams

 

 1.   Write Posts in Advance and Schedule them for later

WordPress, Jhoomla and all CMS give us ability to schedule our post to publish later automatically then why don’t we take advantage of this technology in need, You just need to write some posts in advance and schedule it to publish during exams this is the best way to manage your blog during exams.    

 2.   In holidays between exams give little time to your Blog

No matter how busy you are during exams, spend sometime to write quick blog posts. Just think it’s not a big deal, as we all know, no one do study 24*7 during exams specially bloggers can’t, just make a strong promise to yourself that you will not waste your time on social sites and will sit on PC for just a little time and in that little time you must have to complete and publish a post. This idea really works. You just need to be honest to your self promise.  

 3.   Publish your already published old but useful post as new

entry.title: Things to Ensure Before Applying for Google Adsense
entry.content:
I have written it many times and writing it again here that `Adsense is the King of all Ad Networks` and reasons are more than enough for this like  it’s payouts CPC (cost per click), CPM, CTR are much higher when compared to other Ads Networks, and off course due to the brand Google, almost every Blogger want Adsense on their Blog. Getting Adsense is not everyone’s cup of Tea, Google is very strict in order to approve Adsense account to any blog or website, there is no place for any mistake you need to follow their Terms and conditions very strictly, even a very small mistake can led to un-approval of your Adsense application. Here is the list of all important things you should ensure before applying for Adsense to Google.

1.          High Level Domain

When we apply for Adsense our site/blog undergoes two reviews, respectively called as Partial Review and Overall review. The first review can be easily surpassed if you have a domain ending  with .com, .org. In former time Adsense used to accept free domains from WordPress and blogspot but in present era Google become more choosy & strict in its selection and give preference to high level domains ( .com, .org) in its first review.  

2.         Strictly Avoid Copy+Paste

Before applying for Adsense must ensure that there is no copied content on your site or blog means you have not copied any post from any website and pasted on our site (most of people do this and later cry for Adsense). If you have any copied content on your website then `Google may surpass partial review but in second review your application will be disapproved for sure`, so if you are really serious about your earnings with Adsense do stick to the original content. If you don’t take it serious then you will get this reply from Google..  

3.         Enough content

Insufficient no. of posts or so called less content also led to disapproval of an Adsense application. Some people will also tell you that `Content doesn’t play a bright role in Adsense approval` but sadly believe me it’s not true at all ! If you believe me, at least 10 posts should be  there before applying for Adsense otherwise be ready to receive this..

4.         Quality and Type of Content

In order to build a good relationship with Google Adsense, Content on your blog must obey rules stated by Google Adsense. Don’t promote any product related to Pornographic, Drugs, weapons or anything degrading nations & religion peace. Google highly give preference to English as main language so you also try to provide content in form it wants. You may have noticed many sites have more than enough content but they have no Adsense, Do you know why ? because of quality and value of their content, and length of posts. A post should be at least of 300 words.  

5.         Age of Applicant

Google wants to deal with Adults not teens i.e. Age plays an important role in Adsense Approval, if anybody is going to applying for Adsense then he/she must be 18 years old. If you are a blogger having blog fulfilling all the Terms and Conditions of Adsense but your age is less than minimum then you can apply for Adsense through email account of any member of family whose age  is 18+. Otherwise you will get this answer from Adsense..  

6.         Easily visible About & Contact Me Page

Many people won’t give their attention towards this but Google does, About page is very essential for Adsense, About page provides info. about the blogger and Blog (the content what your blog contain’s) it creates a bond between you and your readers. If you don’t have About Page on your blog then stop dreaming of Adsense ! Must mention your email address and your name same as that mentioned in the Adsense application this ensure trust that might build Adsense team on you. Along with About Page `Contact Me` Page is also required though which your readers directly interact with you, this will make your good image to Google. Adsense Team will be glad they are working with one, who not only care about Audience but also like to interact with them and Guide them. In short, this helps Google to make a conclusion that you are more interested in building Audience than earning money.  

7.         Blog design or Theme

Always try to make your blog theme as simple as possible, because in creation of a building something big, every small things counted as important part.  Ensure that your blog is quick loading, SEO friendly, simple and easy for use of readers, in easy words let your blog describe what it is all about i.e and let a Gadget Blog looks like a Gadget.  

8.         Different Ad Networks

Adsense allows different Ad networks along with it, but not every ! If you have no Adsense ads on your blog and you running Ads of other Networks and now you thinking of apply for Adsense  then I strongly recommend you to remove current ads or do check whether those ads are allowed with Adsense or not because even a minor mistake might count and become a negative point for your blog. I’m not saying that you stop permanently using other Ads on your blog, You just stop showing other network ads while applying for Adsense and let them off until Adsense team replies about your account acceptance. If Adsense approve your blog for Ads then you can check if those ads are allowed with Adsense or not then make decision of using them and if Adsense reject your application then you can continue with previous Ads.  

9.         Good Traffic

See, Google Adsense is the Ads King so they have millions of pending Ads request, Good Traffic is one of the main thing Adsense team always looks for, they focus at profit to their advertisers, Your dream of having Adsense Ads will be uncompleted until your blog get a good traffic at least 80-100 visitors per day, for more details you must check this post `What is the minimum requirement of Adsense`.  

10.       Paid Traffic

People use some cheap ways to get traffic on their site one of the most common example is ‘Buying Traffic’, but Dear if you have a wish to earn from best Ads Company, you strictly avoid those cheap things because it might led to disapproval of your Adsense application, and yeah don’t think you are smart and you can make Google fool ! Instead there are many ways to get massive traffic to your blog.  

11.        Avoid Shortcuts, use Complete Words & Sentences in Paragraphs

We have already discussed about `Quality and Type of Content` but I also wanted to tell my Readers that you must use proper completed sentences with formation of paragraphs after an interval interval, this is recommended by Adsense and avoiding it’s ‘Content Type’ criteria may led to disapproval of your Adsense application.  

12.        Privacy Policy

You must have Privacy policy on your blog, it gives a Professional touch to your blog. It can mention in any way, you can place this page with Titles ‘Privacy policy’ or ‘Terms and conditions’. Google says you must focus tio provide best service to your audience and all the readers and ignoring this may became a reason of disapproval of your Adsense Application, then why to take a chance. I have discussed all the important points and possible ways and it will help you to get an Approved Adsense for sure, now if you have any confusion, query, or point regarding it, please let me know via comment. It will be like an honor to interact with you. Read this post in Hindi.

entry.title: How To Track IP who Performing invalid Clicks on Adsense using StatCounter
entry.content:
Just 2-3 days back I wrote a guest post for Ammar Ali’s  blog Allbloggingtips with title `Why and How To Protect Adsense Account From Invalid Clicks?` and because I wrote that post so Ammar sir gave me privilege to handle all the comments below that post, when I visited that page next day I saw many comments at the bottom, most of them thanked Author(me) for sharing that useful info but there I noticed almost every person saying `Hey Thanks K.K this is really helpful, I’m also having a serious issue of invalid clicks on one of my websites these days you have given awesome info. kindly also tell us how to detect those IP’s from where invalid clicks are being performed on our blog`, so this post is dedicated to all those bloggers who are keen to know `How to track invalid Adsense clicks using StatCounter`. Every Adsense publisher knows that Invalid Click Activity on Adsense Ads is really a very serious issue which can lead them to a banned Adsense account from Google and painful thing is that that ban remains permanent. Google may knows everything and it can give you result of any query but still it doesn’t provide any tool to detect the IP’s from where Invalid Clicks or Click Bombing have done. So it’s all publisher’s duty to fetch those IP’s to protecting their AdSense account from Invalid Click Activity. Many webmasters and bloggers have lost their AdSense account just because of Invalid Click Activity and their unawareness, but I’m sure you’re aware enough that’s why you are reading this article on Harkuchh.com, so let’s discus how to track the IP address from where you are getting Invalid Clicks on your Ads. You can track every single IP performing clicks on Adsense Ads by using StatCounter, and it’s pretty easy. All you need to do is read and follow the given steps very carefully, must note that You can’t afford to miss any point. Let’s start..

Track invalid Adsense Clicks using Statcounter

1. Create an account on Statcounter by using your permanent email account. 2. After that you’ll need to create a new project for your website which you want to track. Click on Add New Project and in Project url fill your website URL and fill all the required information like, Project Title, Country, Time Zone, etc. Just select Invisible Tracking and you can choose to receive monthly or weekly reports via email.   3. Once you’re done with the previous step, StatCounter will detect the platform of your website and gives you a code with detailed instructions on how to install the stat counter code in your website, just follow the given instruction carefully.

How to Track IP clicking on Ads

Now once you have set statcounter for your website by following the given instructions, you can start viewing all your site related reports within minutes. Now back to the Statcounter Home page. 4. First of all click on your project name (your site) then click on Stats and next then click on Exit Link Activity here you can find all the Links on which your visitors clicked to Exit from your site. You can find date, time, exit link name and also the page on which the exit link was clicked. Exit link means the link by clicking which a user jumps to a new page that might be your Ad or a link to any other website. If you will examine the links clicked you can find how many clicks are performed there on advertisements and also at what time the click was made. So there you get all the clicks performed on your Ads but this information is not enough because still you are far from those IP’s from where clicks are done so let’s move further, look at the opened page you can easily see a Magnifying glass icon before the date in every row of the table. By clicking on that magnifying glass you will get to the page where you can see more detailed information about the visitor who clicked on the link. You can find the IP address of the clicker(s) here along with his location, host name, browser, OS, resolution, ISP, visiting length, and the pages he viewed including the exit link. Now if you use a bit of your awesome brain you can track all the valid as well as invalid clicks on your Adsense Ads. If you find any IP clicked on your Ads many times it simply means you are being click bombed by that IP, then you can disable ads temporarily on your website or remove your website from authorized websites list in Google AdSense, you can also ban the fetched IP for showing your Ads from cPanel of your site. Hey publisher, it is highly recommended that whenever you feel any sudden or suspicious change in your Adsense Account  like sudden increase in Page CTR or many clicks but Zero or very low CPC then your most important task is to detect the location and IP address of the person doing invalid click activity on your Ads. This is highly recommended because in case you unfortunately get banned from AdSense because of invalid activity on Ads, you will have stats which you can use at the time of appeal for your account being reinstated. I hope if your question was how to check someone’s IP or how to find those IPs who are doing froud clicks, this complete tutorial to featch the IP of invalid clicker on Ads will help you to keep your Adsense safe and along with your forever, have a look of my other Adsense tutorials those will be also helpful for you. For this awesome guidance I expect a share and a comment from your side, will I get it..

entry.title: What is Subdomain ? How to Create SubDomain of my Website
entry.content:
Few days back I created a Subdomain of my website and when I advertised it on Facebook one of my friend asked me Hey K.K, How did you created Subdomain of your website then I said to him that it’s very easy, you can we can create sub-domain of your website through cPanel. He said sorry I don’t know much about cPanel so please tell me in detail `How to create Sub domain in cPanel` then I explained it to him, he suggested me to write a post on it because many people who running their blogs and websites don’t know properly How to create sub-domain of a Domain name, so I’m going to tell you this in very easy language and explained everything very clearly..  

What is Subdomain ?

Subdomains are the third level domains that are used to organize different types of your web site content. Suppose you have a website on Automobile and now you also want to create a site for Gadgets at that time rather than purchasing a new domain, you can create sub domain using the domain you already own, and by this way you can create multiple site by purchasing only one domain. Same like that I wanted to create a website for career tips then I simply made a subdomain (careerguide.harkuchh.com) of my domain name Harkuchh.com.  

How to Create Subdomain of My Website ?

To create a Subdomain just follow instruction given below..
  1. Log in to cPanel.
  2. click on Subdomains under Domain Section.
  3. Type the subdomain name you want in the box before the domain name.
  4. Click inside the ”Document Root” box and it will auto-fill.
  5. Hit the Create button.
  6. You Will see a message that Subdomain has been created ! Now Go back to cPanel Home. 
 

How to Install WordPress in Sub-domain

After making a Subdomain You must need to install a CMS to work in it, so in order to Install Wordpress Instructions are given below..
  1. Click on Fantastico De Luxe in cPanel.
  2. Now Click on WordPress at left.
  3. Carefully choose Domain in which you want to Install WordPress.
  4. Fill Admin Username and Password in Admin access data section.
  5. Click on Create.
  6. Done ! now open your subdomain Wordpress account and work. :lol:
 Must Check : How to create backup of your blog and site.

 

FAQ’s regarding Subdomains

 

Can I delete Subdomain after once created ?

Yes, You can delete is anytime you want from cPanel.

How many Subdomains can I create on one Domain name?

It’s depend on your hosting company, generally 25 Subdomain are allowed with one domain.

Can I Use Different CMS in Subdomains ?

Yes, If you are using Wordpress in main Domain you are free to choose any CMS for subdomain like Wordpress, Jhoomla.

How do I create a subdomain in my control panel ?

Stupid read the post from starting, all is written.

Where to create Subdomains ?

            Subdomains can be created from cPanel of your website.

Change made in main domain will effect subdomain or not ?

change in any domain whether it’s main or subdomain can’t effect any other.

entry.title: What are Pop-ups or what are the Pop up ads ?
entry.content:
Popup ads or pop up advertising are the advertisements that show up in a new browser window when you click or hover on a link or image while surfing on internet. The overall definition of a popup is `a browser window that appears out of nowhere as you are viewing content on the web.` There are also programs known as pop under ads, which display windows behind your web browser window. As a user is surfing the web and visiting various websites, new windows may suddenly (and without user initiation) open and display advertisements and promotions. Pop-Ups are NOT security risks. They can NOT carry Spy Bots, Viruses, or Trojans. The reason they may be blocked is that, if they are designed to open automatically, they can be annoying nuisances!

Major Concerns of PopUps

  • A screen flooded with pop-ups may make navigating the web stressful and difficult.
  • At times, they may look like browsers of normal web pages and can cause confusion to the users. A pop-up may not be even related to the site itself, thus annoying the user with its irrelevance to the site and its obstruction to the browsing experience.
  • Some pop-ups contain inappropriate or even pornographic content, which you may not like to watch.
  • Some pop-ups appear as a result in the site being reloaded, causing loss of information for the users.

How to Block Popup Ads

Ads pop up can be a tremendous annoyance, but there are ways to deal with them. Your best bet would be to close the window and not interact with those popups. The best way to prevent from Popup ads is don’t connect to internet without enabling firewall and Anti-virus software. Increase the security settings in the browser so that Activex controls won’t install automatically and these free classifieds won’t come up to your screen. Default browser of Microsoft Windows `Internet Explorer` is configured to block all pop-up ads by default. If you don’t like the blocker warning or its associated beep, you can control the pop-up blocker’s settings. Also, any good Anti-virus package can be a great tool for avoiding pop-ups. For bloggers pop up advertising can be proved as a great source of income from their blog, but we recommend you to don’t go for it, people hates it and most probably you too.

entry.title: How to add Robots.Txt file to WordPress Blog
entry.content:
Before proceeding let’s know a bit about Why to add or Set Robot.txt file ? The robots.txt file is the key to control the crawlers activity on your website/blog, this helps you to keep some directories of blog out of range of crawling while allowing some, Adding Robots file makes your Wordpress blog more relevant as it block un-relevant url from indexing to the search engines, in easy words by adding robots file, your blog commands google bot  `Hey Robot ! don’t index my Harkuchh.com/wp-admin that’s not important to index !` Now let’s see how to add Robots file to your blog, Believe me I’m telling you the best and easiest way to add Robot file to your blog, there are some alternative ways to add robot file via plugin but using much plugins are not good, so here is the simple guidance to add Robots.txt to a blog, it can be added through cPanel, Don’t worry it’s easy, let’s start..
  • Go to cPanel
  • Click on File Manager under File Section and open Home Directory by clicking Go.
  • Click on Public_Html at Left side of the Screen
  • Now click on New File from the top of the screen
  • Name it as robots.txt and click on Create New File (file create)
  • Now click on new robots.txt file
  • Then click Edit Icon and then click on `Edit` again

What to add in Robots.Txt file

By adding Allow and Disallow commands in robots file we tell the crawler exactly what to crawl and what to not, so here we Disallow all those thing to crawl which are not important to be on Google or any search engine and which are having very important and critical info about the blog, like it’s directories, various parts and components of blog, the thing which we need to exclude from crawling in a normal WordPress blog are given here..
Sitemap: http://Harkuchh.com/sitemap.xml Sitemap: http://Harkuchh.com/sitemap-image.xmlUser-agent: Mediapartners-Google Disallow:User-Agent: * Allow: / User-agent: * # disallow all files in these directories Disallow: /cgi-bin/ Disallow: /wp-admin/ Disallow: /wp-content/ Disallow: /wp-includes/ Disallow: /wp-content/plugins/ Disallow: /wp-content/themes/ Disallow: /wp-content/upgrade/ Disallow: /trackback Disallow: /*trackback Disallow: /*trackback* Disallow: /*/trackback Disallow: /*.html/$ Disallow: /xmlrpc.php Disallow: /?s=* Disallow: *?wptheme Disallow: /blog/?p=* Disallow: /blog/search? Disallow: /xmlrpc.php disallow: /*?* Disallow: /?p=* User-agent: Googlebot-Image Allow: User-agent: Adsbot-Google Allow: / User-agent: Googlebot-Mobile Allow: /
Copy and paste the complete given list of commands to your robots.txt file and just make a small change –add your blog’s URL at the place of mine Harkuchh.com. Don’t ignore to add robots file to your blog because it just not keep your blog’s critical infosafe instead it also helps in better SEO of your blog. Read this post in Hindi.

entry.title: How to Make Money from Blog without Adsense
entry.content:
Blog without Adsense sound bitter. We all know that anyone who make blog have some purposes for sure, some wants to spread their knowledge, some wants to share their thoughts and majority of people make blogs to earn money from Adsense but how those people earn money whose blogs have no Adsense, as you must have noticed some very highly ranked and popular blogs without Adsense, but we know no adsense means no money through ads, so question arises `What happen to those blogs who have no Adsense Ads.` I’m a blogger having a blog so I know the importance of Adsense very well and if you are reading this post then most probably you also a member of Bloggers category and know how essential Adsense is for a blog. Normally people think Adsense Ads is the only way of earnings from a blog but this is as true as I’m the richest person of the world. I’ve already told you, there are many top blogs without adsense now I want to add ` they have no Adsense it doesn’t mean they are getting nothing` instead they still making decent money through their blogs. How would you feel if I tell you blogs making millions of bucks withou Adsense, I know it’s like a joke of the day for you but it’s true. Let’s we discus it’s mechanism…

How Blogs making Money without Adsense

They make money via Ads !! surprised, please don’t be. Actually they make money through Ads but not adsense not even from Adsense alternatives they make big money through Direct Ads marketing which is professionally known as Affiliate marketing, from these direct ads they earn big and fix amount for long term even without up and down like Adsense.

What is Direct Ads marketing

Well it’s preety easy to understand, all you need is bit common sense ! Do you know, in the procedure of Adsense Ads google plays a broker role, suppose Apple is going to lauch a new featured iPad in market then Apple contacts Google for promote that New iPad and Apple pay 3$ to google for one promotion of their product. Then Google shows that iPad on our blogs and website via Adsense Ads and when a visitor of our blog click on that iPad Ad it’s counted as one promotion ( 1 click) and google gives us 2$ for that click, but Apple paid 3$ to google, then where do the remained 1$ gone, well it gone to the Google’s account for promoting the product via it’s Adsense Ads Service. Same thing happens in direct marketing but without the presence of Google i.e. companies contacts the blog owners directly without broker and they pay a fix amountof money for placing their product on blog in the form of image and link ads, and there is no Google to take credit of that amount.

Requirements for Direct Ads

Now if you don’t have adsense Ads because of any reason(s) then don’t think your blog have no future and you won’t leave blogging (many people quit blogging for this reason) you still have many ways to make money online, you just need to fulfill some requirement in order to get Directs ads on your blog which are..
  • High Alexa Rank
  • Google Page Rank
  • Quality Content
Once you fulfill these basic requirements for direct ads on blog people will come and request you for place just one image or link of their company product and believe me they offer that amount which you even never have expected. Affiliate marketing is the most popular way of earning from a blog who have no Adsense but this is not the one and only, people also making good money from..
  • Affiliate Marketing
  • Selling Ad Space
  • Using Text Ads
  • Paid Reviews
  • Adsense alternatives.
So moral of the story is Blogging have a great future without Adsense too, so from now start working for it, fulfill the requirements and ready for earn huge money from internet, after all I’m here to tell you how to earn from blog without Adsense, so you can still earn money through internet and best thing is you can earn by doing work from home or anywhere you want, Happy Blogging. check out : What is the best time to apply for Adsense Ads
